name: Create Bullet clients for new actions in Glide
description: Every time an action is completed in your Glide app (e.g. a form is filled) a message with values from this form will be used to create a Bullet client. To make sure this scenario runs properly you should look how the [example Glide app](https://go.glideapps.com/join/showy-offer-9a2155) is configured.
